service.name: Hiru-kuru
service.description:
Enjoy lunchtime with ease,
and taste deliciously!

benefit.title: Shop's Benefits!
benefit.description1: Through Hiru-kuru, you can reach more customers and increase sales.
benefit.description2: You can efficiently manage orders and inventory through a simple management system.
benefit.description3: You can collect opinions through actual buyer reviews.

benefit.title: Client's Benefits!
benefit.description1: You can check various lunch boxes at a glance and expand your options.
benefit.description2: You can eat conveniently, efficiently, and warmly through pre-ordering.
benefit.description3: You can enhance your meal experience through other buyers' reviews.
